name: Bacterium (itch) (BialoDaniel)
description:
Have you ever thought about the daily routine of red blood cell in the body with weak immune system? When there are no antibodies what can a regular red blood cell do against all the dangers on its way.

Game design by Danil Bialo

Guidance : Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan

 Art & Interaction course, Bezalel Academy of Art and design, 2022
